name: Vibrant (itch) (Imanster)
description:
A Colorful 2D Platformer with simplistic graphics, Vibrant is a short game consisting of only 25 levels.

The game can be played using either a keyboard (Arrow Keys or AWD) or a game pad (Joystick or D-Pad).

Average Game Time : 15 minutes

Platform : Windows

Age : Any
